and.name: Calculator
and.description: Calculator for integers with different operations.

alt.name: Appearance
alt.description: Appearance of the calculator. Only one apperance is selectable.

feature.name: GUI
feature.description: Appearance with graphical user interface.

feature.name: Commandline
feature.description: Appearance in a terminal window (commandline).
Calculates the sum of two integers.
Calculates the difference of two integers.
Calculates the product of two integers.
Calculates the quotient of two integers.

feature.name: mod
feature.description: Calculates the rest of the division between two integers.

feature.name: AND
feature.description: Logical AND conjunction between two integers.

feature.name: OR
feature.description: Logical OR conjunction between two integers.

feature.name: XOR
feature.description: Logical XOR conjunction between two integers.

feature.name: NOT
feature.description: Logical NOT conjunction for one integer. Flips all bits of this integer.

or.name: Extra
or.description: Extra operations for integers or a sequence of integers.

feature.name: Sum
feature.description: Calculates the sum for a sequence of integers.

feature.name: Product
feature.description: Calculates the product for a sequence of integers.

feature.name: DigitSum
feature.description: Calculates the digit-sum of an integer.

feature.name: Exponentation
feature.description: Calculates the exponentation of a given base integer b, and an exponent n.

feature.name: Root
feature.description: Calculates the root r for a given number x and a base n, so that r^n = x.

feature.name: Logarithm
feature.description: Calculates the logartihm y for an integer x and a base b, so that log(x) = y for base b.

or.name: Representation
or.description: Available representation of intergers. Multiple representations are selectable.

feature.name: Decimal
feature.description: Integer as decimal number.

feature.name: BinaryCoded
feature.description: Integer as binary-coded number. Usage with prefix "0b".

feature.name: Hexadecimal
feature.description: Integer as hexidecimal number. Usage with prefix "0x".
